row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@UNIX
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_ZONE_OPTION# = '' :IF &UC4RB_AWS_AVAIL_ZONE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ZONE_OPTION# = '-z &UC4RB_AWS_AVAIL_ZONE#' :ENDIF
echo 'Creating new subnet..'
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute "$EC2_HOME"/bin/ec2-create-subnet &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# -c &UC4RB_AWS_VPC_ID# -i &UC4RB_AWS_IP_BLOCK# &UC4RB_ZONE_OPTION#
ret=$? if [ "$ret" -gt "0" ]; then echo Failed to create subnet. exit $ret fi
echo Successfully create subnet.
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process:
:SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "SUBNET*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) ! Extract the delimiter character from this output_line, usually the tab character : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 7, 1) : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 8) ! Replace all tab characters with single space : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ") : DEFINE &results#, string, 6 : FILL &results#[] = STR_SPLIT(&output_line#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_OUT_SUBNET_ID# = &results#[1] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_STATE# = &results#[2] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_IPS# = &results#[5] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_AVAILABILITY_ZONE# = &results#[6]
: PRINT ID of the new subnet = &UC4RB_OUT_SUBNET_ID# : PRINT The current state of the subnet = &UC4RB_OUT_STATE# : PRINT The number of IP addresses in the subnet that are available = &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_IPS# : PRINT The Availability Zone the subnet is in = &UC4RB_OUT_AVAILABILITY_ZONE#
: PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_SUBNET_ID#, , "WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_STATE#, , "WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_NUM_IPS#, , "WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_AVAILABILITY_ZONE#, , "WORKFLOW" :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
